bike.description: OCLV Mountain Carbon main frame, seatstay & chainstay, Carbon Armor, ABP Convert, Full Floater, E2 tapered head tube, front derailleur internal cable routing, magnesium EVO Link, replaceable derailleur hanger, 120mm travel

components.description: DT Swiss XM 1550 Tricon, 15mm front hub, 142x12mm rear hub; 24-hole, center lock, tubeless rims (no spoke holes)
Bontrager Race X Lite Carbon Low Riser, 31.8mm, 15mm rise, 9 degree sweep
Cane Creek IS-3, E2, alloy cartridge
Trek fork & shock sag meter, Bontrager shock pump
